parameters.name: Index
parameters.description: Index for the loop where to create the patch

title: IShutOffSurfaceFeatureData.GetFaceTangentTo
description: Gets the tangent face for the specified loop where to create the patch.

parameters.name: Index
parameters.description: Index for the loop where to create the patch

remarks:
This method is only available when the type of patch is set to swPatchTypeTangent. See
IShutOffSurfaceFeatureData::LoopPatchType
and
IShutOffSurfaceFeatureData::SetAllPatchTypes
.
See
Accessing Selections that Define Features
for additional details.
